item.title: Indian Markets At Close: Nifty Holds Above 24,400; Sensex Scales 83,000 Led By Pharma, Tech
item.description: Biocon and Glenmark surged on regulatory approvals, while Poonawalla Fincorp rallied 12% on promoter fund infusion.

item.title: Eternal’s Stock Hits Record High As Goldman Sachs Raises Price Target
item.description: Eternal’s market cap is nearly three times that of rival Swiggy

item.title: Maruti Slashes Price Of Entry-Level Models After GST Cut; S-Presso Now Starts At ₹3.49 Lakh
item.description: Rival automakers including Hyundai, Tata Motors have also slashed prices to pass on the GST benefits to the customers.

item.title: Cochin Shipyard Rises On ONGC Order Win; SEBI Analyst Sees Nearly 10% Upside Potential
item.description: Analyst recommends buy-on-dips with a target of ₹2,020–₹2,090.

item.title: General Mills, KKR, And Goldman Sachs Among Global Firms Eyeing Minority Stake In Indian Snack Brand Balaji Wafers
item.description: Founders, the Virani family, are reportedly looking to sell up to 10% stake in the company
